#summary Bug reporting and feature request

= Bug reporting and feature request =

To report any bug or to request a feature, please use *[https://savannah.cern.ch/projects/aaf/ CERN Savannah]*:

 * [https://savannah.cern.ch/bugs/?group=aaf&func=additem Report a new issue] _(please specify _*afdsmgrd*_ in the _*Category*_ field)_
 * [https://savannah.cern.ch/bugs/?group=aaf&func=browse&set=open View the list of all open issues] _(to avoid the submission of already known problems)_

Thank you!
